technikalWorkPage.title: Technical work is underway
technikalWorkPage.countDownText: Remaining until the completion of technical works

mailResentPage.title: Hello,
mailResentPage.emailSentText: We have sent an email to <0>{{email}}</0>. To verify your identity, please follow the link in the email to continue registration. The link will be valid for <1>one hour</1>.
mailResentPage.subtitle: Didn't receive the letter?
checkList: Check your spam folder - sometimes the email may end up there.
Sometimes it may take a few minutes for the email to arrive.
Make sure you entered your email address correctly.
If you still haven't received the email, use the resend button below.

inccorectData.title: If you entered the data incorrectly...
inccorectData.text: Please re-register so that we can successfully create your account.
